title: Lauren
description: A girl with a second chance. A boy with a terrible secret. When the truth is revealed, Lauren's world comes crashing down.For once, seventeen year old lauren's life is going right. She's attending the college of her dreams, has what appears to be the perfect boyfriend, and is surrounded by her childhood friends. But her boyfriend, Tristan, grows more possessive by the day, and his temper is getting harder to keep in check. When lauren realizes Tristan is using her for her power, she has to make a choice: Tristan or her world.
author: Julia Crane
